argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | setsms.x | |- ( ph -> X = ( Base ` M ) ) |
| 2 |  | setsms.d | |- ( ph -> D = ( ( dist ` M ) |` ( X X. X ) ) ) |
| 3 |  | setsms.k | |- ( ph -> K = ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) |
| 4 |  | setsms.m | |- ( ph -> M e. V ) |
| 5 |  | #P_fvex | |- ( MetOpen ` D ) e. _V |
| 6 |  | #P_tsetid | |- TopSet = Slot ( TopSet ` ndx ) |
| 7 | 6 | #P_setsid | |- ( ( M e. V /\ ( MetOpen ` D ) e. _V ) -> ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopSet ` ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) ) |
| 8 | 4, 5, 7 | #P_sylancl | |- ( ph -> ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopSet ` ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) ) |
| 9 | 3 | #P_fveq2d | |- ( ph -> ( TopSet ` K ) = ( TopSet ` ( M sSet <. ( TopSet ` ndx ) , ( MetOpen ` D ) >. ) ) ) |
| 10 | 8, 9 | #P_eqtr4d | |- ( ph -> ( MetOpen ` D ) = ( TopSet ` K ) ) |
